name: nodemainfolder
description: // npm global command, comes with node // npm --version // local dependency use it only in this particular project // npm i <packageName> // global dependency use it in any project // npm install -g <packageName> // sudo npm install -g <packageName> (mac) // package.json - manifest file (stores important info about project/package)' // manual approach (create package.json in the root, create properties etc) // npm init (step by step, press enter to skip) // npm init -y (everything default)
